Curriculum Vitae

	Rahul Singhal
	A-167 Shalimar Garden main Sahibabad, Gzb

	( +91 8826904809                                                     (e) Rahulsinghal042@gmail.com
 


PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSIS

· Having more than 3.5 years of working experience in SAS, SQL. I am having experience in requirement gathering, analysis and implementation of various distributed multi-tier systems.
· Experienced and result-focused data management professional, proficient at paying attention to details and resolving database issues. Capable of analyzing data for business, researching market trends. 
· Specialize in developing tools for multiple projects using technical skills.
· Interacting with client and end users for technical & functional specifications
· Strong problem solving, analytical and Communication skills and ability to master new Technologies and capable of working in groups.
BUSINESS SKILLS

· Extensive experience in providing effective solutions after interpreting results from data mining.

· Possesses in-depth domain knowledge of SAS, SQL and experience in onsite-offshore working model.
· Sound knowledge of data assessment and workflow optimization to generate accurate results

· Detail-oriented and ability to solve critical problems

· Imparting training and mentoring end users. 

Work Experience
Currently Working with Birchstreet /GDI as Data Management Specialist (April’2019-Till present)

Prior Experience –Programmer Analyst in Wipro Limited (Formally known as Aon Hewitt) from June’2016-March’2019.
CORE COMPETENCIES

   :

RDBMS

Oracle 11g
Software

Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint), SQL, and SAS 9.2
ORGANISATIONAL SCAN

BirchStreet/GDI, Noida, India

 Client Handled : Hyatt, Marriott
Team Size   :    6       

Position
:    Data Management Specialist                                         Period-April 2019-till now

    Description
:    Working as DMS in Data Management Team responsible to automate the business and operational processes called as procurement to pay using SQL, SAS, and Tableau.
Responsibilities:

· Extensive experience in providing effective solutions after interpreting results from data mining.

· Implemented procurement based system to over 100 business units of key global clients, including US and UK region.
· Developed a system of data management that ensured proper and cost effective implementation of modules.
· Reviewing/Analyzing customer provided data and normalizing it.

· Streamlining a detailed process to maintain data integrity and mandatory using upto date techniques for analyzing data
· Implementing/setting up the data as per the requirement.
· Monitoring and maintaining data elements in SQL in-house database systems to give accurate results of the queries
Wipro Limited, Noida, India
 Client handled AT&T, State farm, J.C Penny, United Airlines 
Team Size   :    11         

Position
:    PA (Programmer Analyst)                                            Period-Jan 2017-Mar2019
    Description
:    Working as PA in Batch Team and writing SAS/SQL codes to create reports and automate manual process based on client requirements. As a key member of technical shared group, developed and ran SAS programs to support various clients. I was responsible for creating new SAS codes, utilizing existing codes, and maintaining data in SAS. The health and welfare offered to an individual arebased on the analysis done on the requirements provided by the client. The information of the person applicable for various pension plans is gathered and processed for further quires as applicable according to the requirement documents.
Responsibilities:
· Gathering client requirements and providing reporting solutions.
· Analysing the expected and actual results.

· Interacting extensively with end users on requirement gathering, analysis and documentation.

· Carried out data extraction and data manipulation using PROC SQL, PROC SORT and PROC REPORT to create preferred customer report as per business requirements.

· Also a part of the DBP (Direct Billing and Payments) team to provide the billing and payments details of the employee through the MS Access tool.
· Mentored one of the new hires.

· Also actively involved in planning and participating various floor events.

Also Worked as a SCS/Test Engineer for Quality Reporting 
Position: SCS (Setup Configuration specialist)                               Period-June 2016-Dec 2016
    Description
: This is a Conversion Project, which is to ease the process of configuration and Testing to

     Enhance the quality of reporting to the Clients.   
Responsibilities:
· Involved in requirement analysis, understanding of Business Requirements & Functional Specifications of the application.

· Involved in Mainframe testing using DB2, SQL, ISPF, FTP, and Smart File.

· Writing the project test cases, report and test objectives and individual test cases holding.

· Interaction with Clients directly regarding Requirements.

· Finding Bugs and fixing them.
· Responsible for sending status reports to the clients on daily basis.

· Involved in Unit Testing, Function Testing, Regression Testing and Health plan Acceptance Testing (HPAT).
PROJECTS
Actuarial Valuation:

· Project Description :In this project we have a detail of all the participants in MVS Flat file, On the basis of whole year data, client team sends us a report  that why this participant is getting this particular benefit irrespective of these criteria.

Role description 
Create a sample test file for those participants where discrepancies exists.

From the code, we figure out that on which particular selection criteria participant is getting the benefit and based on that we make the changes.
AUTOMATION

Worked on Automation projects for developing report that will fetch data and manipulate the data to calculate amount in different Plan for different month by using SAS macros in code.

Audit Report

Worked on annual audit projects and payroll files for different client.
ACADEMIA
· Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, U.P.T.U, NCR, India

Master in Computer Application                                                                           June’13-June’16

· Acharya Narendra Dev College, University of Delhi, Delhi, India

BSc. Electronics (Hons)                                                                                      June’09-June’12

: Rahul Singhal

: July 1991, 27 years, Male.

Nationality 


: Indian.

Language known

: English, Hindi.

DECLARATION

I hereby declare that above information is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

and apply machine learning algorithm to compare products based on brand and category 
information. Product is matched based on description, image & price.

purchase behaviour and tables synced are published  by email every day.

ETL tool.

Embulk, Scrapy, Selenium Web Driver, Linux 

STMicroelectronics Greater Noida   May 2017 to April 2018 
Role:  Data Science Trainee 

Responsibilities: 
• Responsible for designing, and developing Django based web application tools for auto 

validation of detectors using Python, Django, Machine Learning (Support Vector Machine, 
Pattern Recognition) that is very sophisticated and user friendly for checking the quality of 
packages in semiconductor domain.  

• Fetching failed detectors of different technologies and layers from Brion Database (MYSQL) 
with millions of defects and using pattern recognition, classify the detectors either pass or fail. 

• Query data from oracle database that have past 10 years data for showing defect trends. 
• The layer owner can directly review the packages either on web or pdf that is automatically 

emailed to them. 
• Deployed another Acceptance Threshold tools (Apache based web application framework) that 

is helpful for updating detector’s acceptance threshold along with direction and dose, focus 
bias. 

• Designing new ideas to enhance the use of tools and minimise processing time taken by it. 

Environment: Python, Numpy, Pandas, Scipy, Seaborn, Matplot, Oracle, MYSQL, SQLite3, 
Machine Learning, SVM, Django, HTML, CSS, Java-Script, Linux 

Cynet Systems                           April 2015 to July 2016 
Role:  Data Analyst/ Talent Acquisition 

Responsibilities: 
• Report Development of the performance of recruiters using ‘MS BI’ tool. 
• Employee work measure chart, outputs potential of work done in a day from the time he logged 

in first into the portal and last logged out . 
• Employee Performance Appraisal Management System: Employee Performance Appraisal 

Management Systems Includes various metrics like, Work Quality Quantity of work 
Cooperation, Attitude, Initiative, Dependability, Planning flexibility, leader ship quality. A rating 
scale Software which appraises each individual. Application consists of three modules, 
Employee [Associate] role who have enough privileges to rate himself on various metrics used 
in appraisal evaluation can even view his appropriate rating for every month and so, Supervisor 
Role is a mid-role wherein he can approve/view his underlying associates appraisal rating. 
Manager Role is the one who have the capability of update / Edit appraisal rating of all the 
employees underlying him organisation.developing Custom SSRS Reports [RDL and RDLC’S], 
rolled out Monthly appraisal reports to recipients using Data driven subscription.  

Environment: MS BI, My SQL

• Technical recruitment, Hiring, Campus Recruitment, US Staffing

Hangman: The word to guess is represented by a row of dashes, representing each latter of the word. In most variants, proper nouns, such as names, places, and brands, are not allowed. Slang words, sometimes referred to as informal or shortened words, are also not allowed. If the guessing player suggests a letter which occurs in the word, the other player writes it in all its correct positions. If the suggested letter does not occur in the word, the other player draws one element of a hanged man stick figure as a tally mark.

             Project Description: 

   TGI Friday, LA madeleine, Mims Cafe are the TMM Clients that used to take complete Pricing/Financial        recommendations done via Fishbowl. These clients   used to provide data in the form of different zip files, .csv files. We used to load data from these files into the database then process that data into different POS and Fact tables, that analytics team used to do their analysis and, in the end, recommends customer the pricing of their products and other different services.
   Roles and Responsibilities - 


· Understanding the Business requirements and extracting the mechanism to implement 

Business strategy.
· Performing daily ETL tasks and implementing complex SSIS packages such as reading the data from zip files and processing them as per the business requirements.

· Developed different database jobs to import data from different sources.
· Performed indexing, tuning, query optimization for different jobs. 

· Responsible for creating different reports as per the business requirement.
· Created different SSRS (SQL Server Reporting Services) reports to check the data quality and make sure that information is consistent.
· Automated different ETL processes and reports to avoid manual intervention.
· Preparing documents prior to development phase such as estimation sheet, query log, low-level design document (LLD).

      OS

The disease burden in African Countries according to climates with the most prevailing diseases being       Malaria, HIV/AIDS, and Tuberculosis, Diarrhea, skin diseases, Respiratory tract infections and Malnutrition etc. that they wanted to be integrated with each other to formalize community health structures in line with the decentralization policy.
   Roles and Responsibilities -

Business strategy.

· Performed indexing, tuning, query optimization for different jobs.

· Provided onsite support to MLI after delivery.

       Dedicated team carries out the end to end activities for the Tata Teleservice. Development, Maintenance & support are carried out by the team to process the day-to-day activities of the customer such as voice call, SMS&MMS, Internet connection, Data download and Upload, Video conferencing etc.                          With the latest feeds, these decision agents have various internal modules that turn around a credit        request very efficiently, assessing the risk and accordingly minimizing the risk to the company. This keeps the Customer acquisition and Origination robust in the competitive market.

Business strategy.
